text:
Europa League
Oleksandria - ASSE streaming: where to see the match?
AS Saint-Etienne travels on the pitch of the Ukrainians from Oleksandria on behalf of the fourth day of the Europa League. Discover how to watch this meeting in streaming.
07 Nov 2019, 06:30 by Antoine Chirat



Harold MoukoudiClub previous: Le HavreTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Jean-Eudes Aholou Previous club: AS MonacoTransfer fee: none (ready) Icon Sport



Alpha SissokoClub previous: ClermontTransfer allowance: noneIcon Sport



Yohan CabayeClub previous: without clubTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Sergi PalenciaClub previous: FC BarcelonaTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Miguel TraucoClub previous: FlamengoTransfer allowance: 1 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Denis BouangaClub previous: N√Æmes OlympiqueTransfer fee: ‚Ç¨ 4.5 M Icon Sport



Ryad BoudebouzClub previous: Betis SevillaTransfer allowance: 3.5 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Zaydou Youssouf Previous club: Girondins de BordeauxTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport

ASSE: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




The European Cup is back on European soil and tonight, ASSE makes a dangerous trip to Ukraine on the side of Oleksandria. The Greens have no choice and must absolutely win to continue to believe in a possible qualification for the next round. At the same time, Wolfsburg will host La Gantoise in another fixture.







Oleksandria - ASSE streaming




Zaydou Yusuf + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

In France this Oleksandria - ASSE is broadcast live on television on RMC Sport 1 from 21h from the Ksk Nika stadium. If you can not access the RMC Sport subscription on your television, know that there is an alternative: the 100% digital subscription to watch all the matches and programs streaming on many supports (the list below) . This OTT subscription to RMC Sport is available at a price of 9 euros for SFR subscribers, 19 euros per month without commitment / 25 euros per month without commitment for non-subscribers to the operator.
Discover below the list of supports to watch RMC Sport streaming:


iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch


Android


PC / Mac via Internet browser type Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

Chromecast, Apple TV, Samsung Smart TV, Nvidia Shield, Philips with Connect TV option
